LanguageData.VME_Defeat_Dishonorable.label: dishonorable
LanguageData.VME_Defeat_Dishonorable.description:
Suffering a setback on the battlefield is an insult to body, mind, and spirit.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - A colonist that is downed in combat by a humanlike enemy twice in less than 30 days will start requiring a ceremonial suicide ritual to cleanse his dishonor. Mechanoids and animals don't count for this.
